instructor.name: Joe Gornik
instructor.bio: Joe joined Full Sail in 2011 and has taught Digital Storytelling, Digital Publishing, Typography and Page Layout, Critique Structures, Digital Studio, Portfolio Creation, Personal Identity, Client Relations, Concepts In Advertising and Creating Brand Experience. Joe is an award-winning advertising specialist with 30 years in the ad game who was previously the CEO of Gornik Advertising, (located in Los Angeles and San Diego). Joe is published in “Type in Motion” by Jeff Bellantoni and Matt Woolman for his work on the Doctor Dolittle opening title sequence (in collaboration with world-renowned AIGA medal winner Pablo Ferro). Joe’s client list boasts an impressive group of fortune 500/1000 companies: HBO, Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, New Line Cinema, Touchstone Pictures, Harpo Films, Universal Pictures, Rite Aid, Marriott, Harsco, Farmers Insurance, Hershey Foods, Bank of America, Coldwell Banker, Mitsubishi, Morgan Stanley, Epson, Kaiser Permanente, Ashley Furniture, St. Louis Rams, Doubletree Hotels, Gray Line, Fleetwood Motor Homes, Rock-It Cargo, Air Apparent Travel, Eagle Roofing Products. Joe holds an Associates Degree in Visual Communication from the Art Institute of Pittsburgh, a Bachelor’s degree (BS) in Digital Arts and Design and a Master’s Degree (MFA) in Media Design from Full Sail University.

instructor.name: Jane Smith
instructor.bio: Jane is an expert in typography with a passion for teaching students the nuances of type design.

instructor.name: Jim Brown
instructor.bio: Jim has a rich background in digital illustration and enjoys helping students develop their own unique styles.

instructor.name: Emily White
instructor.bio: Emily specializes in web design and aims to teach students how to create user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing websites.

instructor.name: Michael Green
instructor.bio: Michael is passionate about branding and helps students learn the art of creating memorable brands.

instructor.name: Sarah Blue
instructor.bio: Sarah combines her love of photography and design to teach students how to capture and use stunning visuals in their work.

instructor.name: David Black
instructor.bio: David is an expert in interactive media, focusing on creating engaging and dynamic user experiences.

instructor.name: Laura Brown
instructor.bio: Laura has extensive experience in 3D modeling and helps students bring their creative visions to life in three dimensions.

instructor.name: Chris Grey
instructor.bio: Chris loves motion graphics and enjoys teaching students how to create captivating animated visuals.

instructor.name: Jessica Pink
instructor.bio: Jessica specializes in UX/UI design and helps students create intuitive and engaging user interfaces.

instructor.name: Mark Silver
instructor.bio: Mark is an animation expert who teaches students the core principles of bringing characters and scenes to life.
